reviewText: This was a dissapointing purchase.  I am an intermediate and I really thought this could help me out a little by advancing some of my skills, but it didn't.  The only thing I learned was how to really glaze, because that's all she does is glaze.  She paints 3 trees, a sky and whatever else by glazing everything.  It's not that bad, but it's not good either.  I've bought many other tapes/dvds and this is by far my least favorite.
